item.title: Future [Mathematics] Leaders
item.description: This post was written as part of the Math section for the 2019-2020 Future Science Leaders program. If you’re interested in using any of the resources below for your own outreach program, there are two caveats. You are free to use any of my materials with proper attribution. However, some of the materials below were created or co-created by Matt Coles and for these you should e-mail us to check.
